title: Ясновидящая
overview: The characters of the series are people of different ages, social status, and material wealth. They have one thing in common - the difficult life situation in which they find themselves. Practicing psychic Arina Evdokimova uses her abilities to understand the problem, "open the eyes" of the characters to the real state of affairs, guide them, and suggest behavioral tactics to improve the situation. The abilities of a psychic and the skills of a psychologist help her to simultaneously "look" into the past and future of the heroes, formulate special tasks, after which the fate of the heroes changes for the better...
